subject: Re: [junit] want to generate report (html) by running my simple test suit with drools + ant + junit
msgSnippet: Nikhil, For generating HTML reports with ant, Googling ant junit html worked pretty well for me.  I m not sure how drools would make this more complicated.
messageBody:
Nikhil,

For generating HTML reports with ant, Googling

ant junit html

worked pretty well for me. I'm not sure how drools would make this
more complicated.

David Saff

On Mon, Nov 3, 2008 at 12:54 AM, Nikhil Deval <ndeval@...> wrote:
> hey all
>
> - want to generate report (html) by running my simple test suit with
> drools + ant + junit
> - what are steps need to follow. please share any simple example
> available with you.
>
> Thanks in advance
> Nikhil
>
